actor_awards.notes: Known as 'The Queen of Technicolor' for how well her red hair and green eyes photographed in the medium. She received a Golden Boot Award in 2007 for her significant contribution to the Western genre and has a Star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.

filmography.title: Spellbound
filmography.role_description: A disturbed patient at the Green Manors mental hospital.
filmography.plot: A psychiatrist protects the identity of an amnesia patient accused of murder while attempting to recover his memory.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture

filmography.title: Out of the Past
filmography.role_description: A scheming secretary who becomes involved in the noir intrigue.
filmography.plot: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him.

filmography.title: The Spiral Staircase
filmography.role_description: The secretary to the wealthy Mrs. Warren in a house targeted by a serial killer.
filmography.plot: A serial killer targets a mute servant girl in a New England mansion.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress (Ethel Barrymore)

filmography.title: A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court
filmography.role_description: The niece of the King who becomes the love interest of the time-traveling Hank Martin.
filmography.plot: A mechanic is knocked unconscious and wakes up in Camelot in 528 A.D.

filmography.title: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral
filmography.role_description: A lady gambler who catches the eye of Wyatt Earp.
filmography.plot: Lawman Wyatt Earp and outlaw Doc Holliday form an unlikely alliance which culminates in their participation in the legendary Gunfight at the O.K. Corral.

filmography.title: Cry Danger
filmography.role_description: An ex-girlfriend of a framed ex-con who holds the key to the missing loot.
filmography.plot: An ex-con tries to clear his name and find the $100,000 he was accused of stealing.

filmography.title: While the City Sleeps
filmography.role_description: The unfaithful wife of a media mogul's son, involved in the internal power struggle.
filmography.plot: Reporters compete to solve a series of murders in order to win a promotion at a major media conglomerate.

filmography.title: Home Before Dark
filmography.role_description: The beautiful stepsister whose presence exacerbates the mental fragility of the protagonist.
filmography.plot: A woman released from a mental institution struggles to resume her life with her distant husband and his domineering stepmother.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actress (Jean Simmons)

filmography.title: The Great Lover
filmography.role_description: A grand duchess who falls for a bumbling reporter on a cruise ship.
filmography.plot: A reporter on a cruise ship finds himself in trouble when he falls for a duchess and tangles with a murderer.

filmography.title: Since You Went Away
filmography.role_description: An early role as a girl at a dance who dances with a Marine.
filmography.plot: With her husband away at war, a woman struggles to keep her family together and support the war effort on the home front.

filmography.title: Slightly Scarlet
filmography.role_description: A secretary attempting to go straight while dealing with her kleptomaniac sister.
filmography.plot: Two sisters—one a secretary, the other a kleptomaniac—get mixed up with a crime boss.

filmography.title: The Killer Is Loose
filmography.role_description: The wife of a police detective who becomes the target of an escaped convict.
filmography.plot: A savings-and-loan robber escapes from prison and seeks revenge on the detective who killed his wife.

filmography.title: Abilene Town
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a shopkeeper who is one of the love interests of the town marshal.
filmography.plot: A marshal tries to keep the peace between cattle drovers and homesteaders in 1870s Kansas.

filmography.title: Inferno
filmography.role_description: A treacherous wife who abandons her injured husband in the desert to die.
filmography.plot: A millionaire is left to die in the desert by his wife and her lover, but he fights to survive and seek revenge.

filmography.title: Alias Jesse James
filmography.role_description: An insurance beneficiary who gets involved with a bumbling agent trying to protect Jesse James.
filmography.plot: An inept insurance salesman sells a life insurance policy to the notorious outlaw Jesse James.

filmography.title: Tennessee's Partner
filmography.role_description: The owner of a gambling establishment who has a complex relationship with the gambler Tennessee.
filmography.plot: A gambler and a cowpoke form an unlikely friendship in a California gold rush town.

filmography.title: The Last Outpost
filmography.role_description: A woman caught between two brothers fighting on opposite sides of the Civil War.
filmography.plot: Two brothers, one Union and one Confederate, join forces to defend a town against Apache raids.

filmography.title: Pony Express
filmography.role_description: A strong-willed woman who aids Buffalo Bill and Wild Bill Hickok.
filmography.plot: Buffalo Bill and Wild Bill Hickok join forces to establish the Pony Express mail route across California.

filmography.title: The Big Circus
filmography.role_description: A press agent helping a circus owner keep his show afloat despite sabotage.
filmography.plot: A circus owner struggles to keep his show on the road while dealing with a saboteur and financial troubles.

filmography.title: Bullwhip
filmography.role_description: A fiery redhead who agrees to a marriage of convenience to run her fur trading business.
filmography.plot: A cowboy agrees to marry a woman to save himself from hanging, only to find she is a headstrong fur trader.

filmography.title: Yankee Pasha
filmography.role_description: An American woman kidnapped by pirates and taken to a harem in Morocco.
filmography.plot: A frontiersman travels to Morocco to rescue his fiancée who has been captured by Barbary pirates.

filmography.title: Serpent of the Nile
filmography.role_description: The Queen of Egypt who seduces Mark Antony in this historical adventure.
filmography.plot: Cleopatra schemes to hold onto her power in Egypt through her relationship with Mark Antony.

filmography.title: Hong Kong
filmography.role_description: A missionary working in Hong Kong who gets involved with an adventurer seeking treasure.
filmography.plot: An adventurer in Hong Kong tries to steal a valuable idol but falls in love with a missionary.

filmography.title: The Golden Hawk
filmography.role_description: A female pirate captain who clashes and romances a French privateer.
filmography.plot: A French privateer battles the Spanish and a female pirate captain in the Caribbean.

filmography.title: The Crowded Sky
filmography.role_description: A stewardess on a commercial airliner destined for a mid-air collision.
filmography.plot: A commercial airliner and a Navy jet fly toward a fateful mid-air collision while the personal lives of the crew unfold.

filmography.title: The Nude Bomb
filmography.role_description: A fashion designer involved in a plot to destroy clothing.
filmography.plot: Agent 86, Maxwell Smart, is called back to duty to stop a villain from destroying all the fabric in the world.
